title: Council Directive 80/369/EEC of 26 March 1980 authorizing the French Republic not to apply in the French overseas departments Directives 72/464/EEC and 79/32/EEC on taxes other than turnover taxes which affect the consumption of manufactured tobacco
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 26 March 1980  authorizing the French Republic not to apply in the French overseas departments Directives 72/464/EEC and 79/32/EEC on taxes other than turnover taxes which affect the consumption of manufactured tobacco  (80/369/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following sentence shall be added to Article 12 (1) of Directive 72/464/EEC and to Article 9 (2) of Directive 79/32/EEC:
"The French Republic shall not be obliged to apply the provisions of this Directive in the French overseas departments."
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1980.
For the Council
The President
G. MARCORA  (1)OJ No L 303, 31.12.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 10, 16.1.1979, p. 8.
